cs4620.mesh

Class OBJMesh

  • java.lang.Object
    • cs4620.mesh.OBJMesh

  • public class OBJMesh
extends java.lang.Object
    Mesh Data Represented In An OBJ Format Note That "Unique" Is Used With Quotation Marks Because It Is Preferred That All Data Found Within The Lists Is Unique
    Author:
    Cristian

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      java.util.ArrayList<Vector3> normals
      List Of "Unique" Normals
      java.util.ArrayList<Vector3> positions
      List Of "Unique" Positions
      java.util.ArrayList<Vector3i> triangles
      List Of "Unique" Vertices Each Component Indexes Into Vertex List With Triangle Orientation Being X->Y->Z
      java.util.ArrayList<Vector2> uvs
      List Of "Unique" Texture Coordinates
      java.util.ArrayList<Vector3i> vertices
      List Of "Unique" Vertices X Component Indexes Into Positions List Y Component Indexes Into Texture Coordinates List Z Component Indexes Into Normals List
